# INNotebookDomainHandling

**Protocol**

An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the lists and notes domain.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol INNotebookDomainHandling : INAddTasksIntentHandling, INAppendToNoteIntentHandling, INCreateNoteIntentHandling, INCreateTaskListIntentHandling, INSearchForNotebookItemsIntentHandling, INSetTaskAttributeIntentHandling
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INNotebookDomainHandling] protocol is a convenience protocol that adopts all of the protocols used to handle list, note, and reminder-related intents. When your app adopts all of the protocols associated with notes and reminders, you can adopt this one protocol instead of adopting the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCreateNoteIntentHandling], [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INAppendToNoteIntentHandling], [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForNotebookItemsIntentHandling], [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCreateTaskListIntentHandling], [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INAddTasksIntentHandling], and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetTaskAttributeIntentHandling] protocols separately.

An object that adopts this protocol must be able to respond to the following intents:

- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCreateNoteIntent], a request to create a new note.
- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INAppendToNoteIntent], a request to modify an existing note.
- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent], a request to search for existing notes.
- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCreateTaskListIntent], a request to create a new list of tasks or reminders.
- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INAddTasksIntent], a request to add tasks to an existing task list.
- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetTaskAttributeIntent], a request to modify a task.

Your handler object must be prepared to resolve any parameters associated with these intents and to confirm and handle the requests. When confirming and handling a request, you provide the response object that matches the specified intent.

## Domain-Handling Protocols

- **INMessagesDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the messages domain.
- **INWorkoutsDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the workouts domain.
- **INPaymentsDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the payments domain.
- **INCallsDomainHandling**: Provides a convenient way to adopt all of the protocols in the VoIP calling domain.
- **INVisualCodeDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the visual codes domain.
- **INPhotosDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the photos domain.
- **INRidesharingDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the ride-booking domain.
- **INCarCommandsDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all the handling protocols in the car commands domain.
- **INCarPlayDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the CarPlay domain.
- **INRadioDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the radio domain.

## Inherits From

- INAddTasksIntentHandling
- INAppendToNoteIntentHandling
- INCreateNoteIntentHandling
- INCreateTaskListIntentHandling
- INSearchForNotebookItemsIntentHandling
- INSetTaskAttributeIntentHandling
- NSObjectProtocol
